item.description:
Hi folks,
By the year 2012, 50% of all American Households will run a home-based business. The time is NOW to look at what FDI has to offer and Join the growing movement that is sweeping America.

Join us at FDI's Boston Home Based Business Expo - Thursday, May 28 - Saturday May 30.

Thursday and Friday - 6:30 PM Networking, 7:00 PM Presentation ***Thursday night only- Special Guests CEO/Founder William Andreoli and VP of Leadership Development Mike Randolph***

Saturday - 9 AM - All day event

Where: Doubletree Suites, 400 Soldiers Field Road, Boston MA

Directions: http://www.mapquest.c... city=Boston&state=MA&address= 400+Soldiers+Field+Road

RSVP: With Bernadette Trafton at 603-834-4587 for FREE entrance to these events.

P.S. Would you like to borrow my Personal Assistant? Call me!

Bernadette Trafton
Marketing Director
Home Office: 603-764-5788
Cell Phone: 603-834-4587
www.BostonAREIA.com
Bernadette@BostonAREIA.com

group.name: The Boston Area Real Estate Investors Association

item.name: FDI Home Based Business Expo
